interactive-story.chat.provider.description: [Chat] The LLM provider to use for generating story dialogue.

interactive-story.chat.model.description: [Chat] The model identifier for story generation (e.g., 'anthropic/claude-3.5-sonnet').

interactive-story.chat.endpoint.description: [Chat] The API endpoint for chat completions.

interactive-story.chat.temperature.description: [Chat] Controls randomness for story generation. Higher is more creative.

interactive-story.chat.maxTokens.description: [Chat] The maximum number of tokens to generate in a chat completion.

interactive-story.chat.providerOptions.o.description: [Chat] (Optional) The HTTP-Referer header to send to OpenRouter.

interactive-story.chat.providerOptions.o.default: Interactive Story Game for VS Code
interactive-story.chat.providerOptions.o.description: [Chat] (Optional) The X-Title header to send to OpenRouter for identifying your app.

interactive-story.summarization.provider.description: [Summarization] The LLM provider for meta-tasks like summarizing and character updates.

interactive-story.summarization.model.description: [Summarization] The model identifier for meta-tasks. A fast and capable model is recommended.

interactive-story.summarization.endpoint.description: [Summarization] The API endpoint for meta-task completions.

interactive-story.summarization.temperat.description: [Summarization] Controls randomness for meta-tasks. Lower is better for factual summaries.

interactive-story.summarization.maxToken.description: [Summarization] The maximum number of tokens to generate for meta-tasks.

interactive-story.summarization.provider.default: Interactive Story Game for VS Code (Summarizer)
